net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: BasicToon
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Allows the developer to investigate and change values on the BasicToon for a selected token. Options are:
edit: Prompts the developer to select a field to overwrite. This will overwrite the entire field (not merge) and only prompts for the top level fields. Sub-object fields are not editable in this manner.
set: Prompts the developer to completely ovewrite the entire BasicToon for the token.
print: Prompts the developer for a field to print, including the option of "all" to print the entire BasicToon. The field value is then printed to a dialog box for easy viewing and copying.
